needHelp.title: Need Help?
needHelp.description: Try our AI Symptom Guide to find the right specialist.

upcomingAppointments.title: Upcoming Appointments
upcomingAppointments.description: Manage your and your family's upcoming visits.

appointments.pageDescription: View, reschedule, or book new appointments for your family.

dialog.title: Book a New Appointment
dialog.description: Fill in the details to schedule your next visit.

report.notes: Patient reported sharp pain and swelling in the left knee after a fall. MRI confirms a grade 2 tear of the medial meniscus. Advised conservative treatment with physiotherapy for 6 weeks. NSAIDs prescribed for pain management. Follow-up scheduled to assess progress and determine if surgical intervention is necessary.

appointments.cancelDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently cancel your appointment.

toast.incompleteDescription: Please fill out all fields to book an appointment.
toast.bookedDescription: Your appointment has been successfully scheduled.
toast.canceledDescription: The appointment has been successfully removed.

family.pageDescription: Add and view members of your family to manage their healthcare.

dialog.title: Add a New Family Member
dialog.description: Enter the details of your family member.

toast.addedDescription: {name} has been added to your family list.
toast.removedDescription: {name} has been removed from your family list.

symptomGuide.pageDescription: Describe your symptoms below, and our AI assistant will suggest the most appropriate medical department for you to consult. This is not a medical diagnosis.

form.label: Describe your symptoms
form.placeholder: e.g., 'I have a persistent cough, chest pain, and difficulty breathing for the last 3 days.'
form.infoNote: Please be as descriptive as possible for a better suggestion.

results.title: Suggestion Received
results.disclaimer: This is an AI-powered suggestion and not a medical diagnosis. Please consult a qualified healthcare professional for an accurate diagnosis and treatment.

medicines.pageDescription: Search for available medicines from the pharmacy.

notFound.title: No Medicines Found
notFound.description: Your search for "{searchTerm}" did not return any results. Please try a different search term.

prices.pageDescription: Review the estimated costs for common medical procedures with your insurance plan.
prices.footerNote: *Prices are estimates and may vary based on hospital, room type, and specific medical needs.

teleconsultation.pageDescription: Connect with top specialists via video call at your convenience.

noDoctors.title: No Doctors Found
noDoctors.description: There are no doctors available in the selected department. Please try another one.

dialog.title: Schedule Video Consultation
dialog.description: Select a date and time for your call with {name}.

availableNow.title: This doctor is available for an instant call.
availableNow.description: You can confirm to start the call immediately.

toast.incompleteDescription: Please select a date and time for the consultation.
toast.bookedDescription: Your video call with {name} has been scheduled.

balance.title: Current Balance
balance.description: Your available funds for healthcare expenses.

addFunds.title: Add Funds to Wallet
addFunds.description: Top up your wallet using UPI.

savings.title: Monthly Savings
savings.description: Your micro-savings contributions over the last 6 months.

policies.pageDescription: Fill in your details to find out which government health and welfare policies you may be eligible for. This tool provides guidance and is not a final determination.

details.label: Describe the required medical treatment or situation
details.placeholder: e.g., 'Requires heart bypass surgery', 'Maternity and childbirth expenses', 'Seeking support for disability'

form.infoNote: Your information will be used to check for eligible policies.

results.title: Eligibility Results
results.description: Based on the information provided, here are the policies you may be eligible for.
results.disclaimer: This information is AI-generated and for guidance purposes only. Eligibility is determined by official government agencies. Please verify details on the official policy websites.

none.title: No Eligible Policies Found
none.description: We could not find any matching government policies based on the details you provided.
